item.title: Note to self: do not bite cashew shells
item.description: 09:14 Wednesday 20 December 2017 -03 Here is Brazil, cashew fruit are available at any fruit stand. I tried the fruit. So much water spilling out I think it should be called watermelon. Very stringy and not so delicious, but edible. Once I finished the fruit, I looked at the stem looking thing. Wait, so you’re telling me there’s a cashew nut in here? That’s awesome! It was too hard to crack with my fingers, so I used my teeth to try to crack it open.
